name: CameraBag Pro
detailed_description:
***CameraBag Pro: Professional Editing and Filtering for Photos and Videos***

CameraBag Pro includes all the same great features as CameraBag Photo, but also works on videos and includes LUT support!

CameraBag Pro is the ultimate tool for bringing both advanced adjustments and over 200 one-click filters to your videos and photos. It’s a filmmaker’s and photographer's dream - much more powerful than cheesy “one-click” filter apps, but also much lighter, quicker, and more intuitive than bloated, decades-old legacy software packages.

Here are some of the awards and praise CameraBag has won:
“#2 Mac App of the Year” - Apple
“A revolution for photo editing.” - Professional Photographer Magazine
“Stunningly fantastic...I don't think I've ever seen any photo app quite as elegant and simple to use.” - Cult of Mac

Highlights:
- Over 200 included fully-adjustable presets
- Dozens of professional layerable adjustments
- Save any set of adjustments as your own reusable preset
- Advanced film and lens emulation effects
- 32-bits-per-channel processing offers unparalleled image quality
- Intuitive award-winning interface
- Use the same toolset to filter photos and videos
- Batch filtering and cropping/resizing
- Watermarking
- Dead pixel correction
- RAW photo support
- Filter import/export via 3D LUT

Award-winning interface:
- Extra-large curves and sliders hover over your image to give more precise control
- Tile-based system for layering and nesting adjustments
- Animated adjustment previews
- Full-screen preset chooser
- Quickly navigate media and presets with keyboard arrow keys
- Copy and paste adjustments and individual curves
- Histograms, waveforms, and chrominance chart
- Multi-document tabs
- Side-by-side image editing

Perfect for:
- Social media accounts: easily resize and filter all your media in batches to create a consistent style
- Wedding photographers: process hundreds of photos at once with your unique filtering, border, and watermark
- Video color correcting: bring the advanced adjustments from the photo world to your video footage
- Professional photography: use innovative, advanced, and precise curve tools found nowhere else
- Film emulation: ultra realistic film grain and camera effects can be layered and adjusted to match any physical film stock/camera

short_description: CameraBag Pro is the ultimate tool for bringing both advanced adjustments and one-click filters to your photos and videos. It’s a photographer’s and filmmaker’s dream - powerful, light, quick, and intuitive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 64 bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.9 or higher
  • Processor: 64 bit
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
